rows.label: tlk70000023_02_msg0002
rows.name:
In Acedia, they say the Holy Grail
is divine revelation, but he looks
more like a monster to me!

rows.label: tlk70000023_02_msg0003
rows.name:
If only that brave knight were
here now... Ornella-sama...

rows.label: tlk70000023_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Years ago, back when I was just a girl,
there were stories of a great knight
in a place called Hyber Village.

rows.label: tlk70000023_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Ornella-sama was not just strong,
she was kind. And exceptionally
beautiful, so they said.
